import React from 'react'; function Auth() { return (

PASSWORD

Forgot your password?

{' '}
Need an account? Register

Ideation & concept

Suddenness is a website where people can come and exchange pictures online.
Suddenness is a place where people can post pictures and different media for others to like and share reactions to.

The login page was designed for ease of use and privacy. Users can login to the website using their email address or through twitter or google. There is also a forget password option using which the users can reset their password.

The dashboard contains all the tools using which the user can post pictures or videos online. Others can use the tools available to like the posted media or comment or pay a tip to the person who posted the media. There is also a suggested section which recommends user accounts for people to follow.

); } export default Auth;
